GSD.description:
wifi: mac80211: sdata can be NULL during AMPDU start

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v6.1.8 by commit c838df8461a601b20dc1b9fb1834d2aad8e2f949. For more details please see the references link.
